text: Vallappuzha Railway Station is a railway station serving the town of Shornur in the Palakkad District of Kerala. It lies in the Shoranur - Mangalore Section of the Southern Railways. Trains halting at the station connect the town to prominent cities in India such as Nilambur, Shornur and Angadipuram. ==Nilambur–Shoranur line== This station is on a historic branch line, one of the shortest broad-gauge railway lines in India. title: Vallapuzha railway station
